name: IfSunSets
summary: IfSunSets is a Survival Game with Adventure & RPG elements. By day, you have to gather supplies for your survival on this island. As night falls, you will encounter strong and dreadful enemies that will relentlessly hunt you down.

name: IF: Imaginary Friends
summary: The main character, a young boy named Croqui, is reunited with the imaginary friends he created in his infancy due to a mental regression caused by the birth of his younger sister. Fearing that he will be forgotten again, the friends try to trap him in their imaginary world by playing games with him! You are Croqui and you will win the game with your friends. An adventure game with an atmosphere like a picture book or a painting, featuring unique imaginary friends.

name: If You’re a Man, Hold On for Half a Song
summary: This is an action shooter with extremely simple controls.Its gameplay duration is short but concise, with no filler content at all.The levels seem simple yet hide subtle twists, and there are plenty of little surprises waiting for you to discover!Anyway, it’s free—you can’t go wrong with it.

name: I Found the Well
summary: A game about descending into the depths of a terrible place, and then climbing back up.

name: If U Seek Amy
summary: An RPG about the Princess of Pop, Britney Spears.

name: If My Heart Had Wings
summary: Aoi Minase returns with shattered dreams to his wind-swept hometown of Kazegaura. There, atop a hill lined with wind turbines, he encounters a wheelchair-bound girl, Kotori Habane, and a beautiful, white glider soaring through the sky. Together, they decide to revive their school's defunct Soaring Club in order to ride the "Morning Glory", a phantom cloud carried on the wind that blows across Kazegaura. This is a tale of youth, a tale of boys and girls who loved the sky.

name: If You're a Ghost Call Me Here!
summary: If You're a Ghost Call me Here! is an adventure where the player must instantly judge the content of multiple conversations that are displayed on the screen at the same time, and continue to make the right choices in order to connect combos!

name: If My Heart had Wings: Flight Diary - New Wings: Akari
summary:
This Spring, take flight again as Akari’s route joins If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary-, in a special DLC titled New Wings: Akari.

An additional story for If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary-, featuring Akari and her bashful emotions towards Aoi. With her support, will the Soaring Club reach the skies once again?

name: If Only I Could Go Home Early
summary:
“If only I could go home early” is a pixel wind adventure puzzle game. It’s about a young man who is a workaholic and does not spend time with his wife. As a result, his wife launched a retaliation against him, playing dead.
The player must unlock the puzzle designed by the wife who is a SOHO novelist in every level. Otherwise, the game is over. The posture of dead body, the painting on the wall, and so on, everything in the house may be the key to unlock the puzzles. The biggest secret of the wife is waiting to be lift the veil.

name: If Letters Had Pants, Would They Wear Them Like This? What About Numbers? What If They Had Small Shovels and They Dug Stuff Up to Put in a Museum?
summary:
Find words in a randomized grid of letters. The used letters will leave empty spaces, which the other letters can bridge, allowing for words that weren't possible before, over larger and larger areas.

Your score depends on both the length of the word, and the size of the area it spans. You want to make longer words over bigger areas to score more points and reach the level's goal before the timer runs out.

If you manage to complete the level, you will be presented with 3 pairs of pants for 3 different letters. Pants give unique bonuses to letters, a letter can be worth more, or maybe it multiplies the whole word’s value, or maybe it gives you bombs or does other things.

As you dig through the letters, you also dig through the dirt. Beneath the earth you will find objects lost to time. (and to their owners) Uncover these sometimes-precious items, sell them, and expand your museum, then place the items in the museum and unlock new gameplay modifiers as the museum’s collection completes.

name: If 2
summary: If 2 is an visual novel game, developed and published by Active, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: If 3
summary: If 3 is an Adventure game, developed and published by Active, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: If
summary: If - Invitations from Fantastic stories is a erotic game developed by Active.

name: IFO
summary: Learn how to control an alien spaceship in this cryptic and constantly changing puzzle game.

name: Ifrit
summary: Ifrit is a first-person psychological horror game. It can impress you with its dark atmosphere, which is realistic and frightening. Are you ready to face the Ifrit demons, the strongest of the demons?

name: I Feel Fantastic
summary: In ancient Greek mythology, Pygmalion was a highly accomplished Cypriot sculptor. Though skilled at imitating the human form, and well acquainted with it's subtleties, he became disgusted by it when he witnessed the Propoetides prostituting themselves. These women were punished by Venus for their lack of worship with a coarseness of skin and a crudeness of nature, and were then forced into prostitution. Seeing this, Pygmalion the sculptor was repelled and could no longer appreciate women.

name: I Frog-ot
summary: A short horror- I mean, cute game :) Help a normal, innocent frog get back to his super awesome wizard self!! :O

name: Ifu
summary:
South Africa, 1900: A man is brought to a field hospital wounded and on the verge of death. A volunteer nurse saves him.

A point and click game of memory and deduction. Thematically, it is an exploration of trauma and forgiveness. The game takes place in an alternate history version of the Second Boer War/South African War

name: If You Go Down in the Woods Today
summary: In this round-based survival game, you play as a forest ranger who has been stationed in the middle of the woods. The other residents of the forest are none too happy with your presence and will stop at nothing to bring it to an end. How long will you survive?

name: Ifighter 2: The Pacific 1942
summary:
iFighter2 brings you back to the Pacific War in World War II to challenge the Empire of Japan with their powerful fighter jets and aircraft carriers.

iFighter2 is a masterpiece remake of the classic arcade experience!

name: If We Make It Home
summary: Snipping. Pruning. Eating. At what point are you no longer human? IF WE MAKE IT HOME. is a short narrative space thriller, about an advanced space suit ensuring survival at all costs. Inspired by 'The Suit', by Scott Base.

name: If Platformers Were Rpgs
summary: What if platformers were RPGs ?

name: I Found a Cat in the Rain
summary: A short Bitsy story inspired by our pets. It's about how a pet can change our way of life, bringing back love and hope.

name: Iffy Institute
summary: Iffy Institute is a fast-paced maze action game for 2-4 players, in which the five most high-profile lab animals fight for survival in a mad scientists lab. Build explosion chains with powerful directional bombs and roast your enemies with super-mighty special skills.

name: If Fusion Were That Easy
summary: "If Fusion Were That Easy" is a humorous 2.5D point-and-click adventure about cold fusion and preventing the apocalypse. Explore a diverse world, master tricky puzzles and stop the inevitable.

name: If My Heart Had Wings: Flight Diary
summary: While If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary- is technically a fan disc for If My Heart Had Wings, it includes six stories - including the prologue and epilogue to the main story - and acts as a sort of sequel to the original.

name: IFSCL: A Code Lyoko Fangame
summary:
The IFSCL is an unofficial game of the animated show Code Lyoko, professionally made by a passionate french fan for more than a decade and still in production.
First and foremost, it's an interactive reproduction of the interface of the supercomputer that the nerd of the group, Jeremy, uses in an abandonned factory to send his friends in a dangerous virtual world, Lyoko. This is also 3D adventure game that happens within the 'real' world of the series.

name: Iffermoon
summary:
The day the Iffermoon crashed, the world changed forever.

In Iffermoon, you will explore your new world and meet many unique characters who will be willing to join your party and help you on your quest to defeat Cosmose. Customize your party into a formidable fighting team for action based battles, engaging in physical combat as well as traditional rpg style commands.

There are also three complete games within this game, accessible through arcade machines, each with their own rewards to improve your abilities on your central quest.

name: If We Were Allowed To VIsit
summary:
If We Were Allowed To Visit is an anthology of interactive poems by Gemma Mahadeo rendered by Ian MacLarty.

As you move through the game's environment, the poems are rearranged into the shapes of the objects they're about, each frame becoming a new generative poem.

name: If Found...
summary: If Found… is an interactive visual novel from Dreamfeel about searching for connection. Find out who you really are.

name: If on a Winter's Night, Four Travelers
summary: A narrative-driven point-and-click adventure that explores the stories of four different characters in a masked ball taking place on a train in the late 1920s.

name: If Red Then Stop
summary: Program traffic lights, barriers, and more to solve your city’s traffic problems! Improve your coding skills by learning to control time-dependent processes with realistic state machines.

name: I Found Myself in a Strange House and I'm Scared
summary: I found myself in a strange house and I'm scared. I think I got into some kind of loop. The house is constantly changing, surely I saw something inexplicable and terrible. I have to get out of here. Every time I go through a cycle, one of the chains on the basement door disappears. I should probably get in there and get out of here. I'm very scared.

name: If My Heart Had Wings
summary: This game is an animated visual novel based on a youthful, dream filled high school life story. This game portrays the player as Aoi, the protagonist, and brings the player through the feat of building the glider that will realise their dreams, while bonding with the female characters.

name: IFU
summary: IFU is a psychological horror about a young guy who is forcibly locked in an abandoned mansion of a dead surgeon along with his restless soul.

name: .If All The Lonely Nights.
summary:
.if all the lonely nights. is a game based on a personal experience, one that happened to myself one early morning in the spring of 2024, in Malaga.

Dealing with whatever feelings have always been difficult for me—even if they are not necessarily unpleasant or sad—and, to my surprise, I have found in video games a way to channel this pressurized stream of complex thoughts.

If at any time you feel overwhelmed by the emotions that certain situations generate in you, I encourage you to try to create something with all of that. Although it doesn't have to be a little game, redirecting all that expressive power into a creative exercise can be a wonderful way to let off steam.

name: iF-22 Persian Gulf v5.0
summary: Interactive Magic's first flight simulation after building their own game engine "DEMON-1" with a focus on the iF-22.

name: If you know what I mean
summary: It is a real and very emotional story about Emily and her own life. It is full of adventures and excitements. Hope, you will enjoy!

name: I face the darkness
summary: This is a casual, horizontal version, action, shooting game, no plot, no dialogue, single player

name: Ifrit
summary: A freeware shmup created by Zac Station with 3 stages. After beating all stages, the game loops with increasing difficulty.

name: I Feel Very Lonely and I Don’t Remember Myself
summary: A short sci-fi visual novel about four scientists trapped in an underground lab. Explore their chat records to uncover the mysteries of Inturg Technologies. How can they escape their doom?

name: If One Thing Changed
summary: What would your life be like... If one thing changed...

name: I Forgot my Coffee!
summary: Github Game Off 2020 - Made in 14 Days

name: If I Were in a Sealed Room With a Girl, I'd Probably XXX
summary: If I Were in a Sealed Room With a Girl, I'd Probably XXX is a Nintendo 3DS game released by D3 Publisher on March 15, 2012 . Character design by Dmyo .

name: If
summary: If is a Yume Nikki fangame, the main objective being exploration and collecting effects. Something a bit different about If is that, instead of using the bed to enter the dream world, Shimitsuki moves her bookcase to reveal a static-like portal that she jumps into.

name: I.F.O
summary:
I.F.O is an old school LCD-style shoot'em up game. 
You have to shoot UFOs using a classic aircraft and save the animals which kidnapped by the aliens. 
Let's save the Earth from the aliens! You are the last hero of the world.

name: I Feel the Need
summary: "You're not going to be happy unless you're going Mach 2 with your hair on fire." Break your limits by taking on the most difficult aerial missions known to man. Ride straight into the danger zone, risk high G-forces to pull off insane maneuvers, and engage in thrilling dogfights.

name: If Nil then
summary:
if Nil then is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.
You begin the game as a spirit named Nil, stuck in a blood covered room with a disembodied head. Interacting with the head will allow to take control of Nozomi.

name: If it's for My Client, I'd Even Schedule a Demon Lord
summary: Pencil in time on your calendar for this parodical planner puzzle game more like work than any other! This witty career will have you solving schedules for everyone from your brother to a demon lord.

name: I Found a New Friend
summary:
You've had a long day. All you want to do is climb into bed. But why is your pillow quivering like that?

I Found a New Friend is a short text adventure in the style of the old Infocom games. It is based loosely on the They Might Be Giants song of the same name.

name: I Feel Fine
summary: The meteorite will hit your space station in 3 days, and you’re bolted to the floor. Can you convince someone to free you? Meet, persuade, and escape certain doom with a large cast of characters in this bittersweet and hilarious adventure game!

name: I Fought the Lawn
summary: Cut and mow blade after blade, build up a fleet of machines, add upgrades for challenging lawns. Procedurally generated yards offer new challenges and rewards. Call on friends to help, or save the job for yourself!

name: If You Let Me In
summary:
You need me...
More than ever...
I'm here...
Reaching out...
I can help you...

If you let me in...

name: If the Dream of Star
summary: If The Dream Of Star is an Asian-language tour attacking and dodging with music, which is a game centered around "psychology". This is a virtual world, where people are carefree but completely happy. Is it really happy?

name: i Fishing Fly Fishing Edition
summary: You've played iFishing, and iFishing Saltwater Edition, now try your luck at Fly Fishing! Fish rivers and streams after species of trout the other games didn't have! Unique Create a photo feature lets you superimpose your catch over an existing photo on your device and email it to your friends for bragging rights. 6 unlockable locations with unique real life animated backgrounds (new for the iFishing series!).

name: If you became a beautiful doll and were picked up by a perverted nerd
summary: A role-playing game from ThreadPIN.

name: If It Moves, Shoot It!
summary: A top-down shoot 'em up for DOS and Amiga.

name: If you became a toyboy doll and were picked up by a girl with perverted personality
summary: An adventure game from ThreadPIN.

name: If Only...
summary: This VR experience uses the architectural design by M@ STUDIO Architects for the 2016 National Gallery of Victoria (NGV) Architecture Commission titled “Haven’t you always wanted…?” which transplanted a familiar object (a suburban car wash) into an unfamiliar surrounding (the art gallery).

name: I, For One, Welcome Our New Lady Knight Overlords!
summary: For the Global Game Jam 2020

name: If Not Us
summary:
Seven years ago, five heroes were brought together to save the world. Their success came at the cost of their leader's life; the secret behind it cost them their friendship.

Now they've been summoned for a new heroic quest.

if not us is about the moment when they realise everything isn't going to be okay.

name: iFactor
summary: iFactor is an excellent way to have some challenging, strategic fun while practicing multiplication.

name: iFishing
summary: iFishing is a mobile fishing simulator by Rocking Pocket Games. It was originally developed and released on iOS and Android, and is now released on the PSN Store for the Playstation Vita.

name: If: Walls Could Answer
summary: What if walls could answer? Whatever that means, you’ll explore the memories of a neurotic scientist resolving puzzles that could help his mental state, discovering different endings of his life.

name: I Fell In Love With A Fantasy Farmer
If It Please the Court
summary: A text-based interactive lesbian romance novel set in 1700's France. Gather intel, or gamble on love in Versailles! Who will catch your eye: a spymistress, a poet, or a traitor to the king?

name: I fell from Grace
summary:
I fell from Grace is a retro style adventure game, that blends storytelling and puzzle solving in a branching narrative style.

Can you solve the mystery of the strange gift that has cured your wife of terminal illness, but unleaches sinister events before it's too late?

name: If we meet after the ending
summary: "Long time no see. You've grown up a lot." 10 years ago, a lover who left me in an accident appeared as a ghost. Can we undo the belated regret?

name: If You Joined the Rugby Club...
summary: A role-playing game from ChinChinDon!.

name: If I'm broken, you are too.
summary: A prototype game where you speak to the monster you created.

name: I-Fluid
summary: iFluid is a physics-based action/platform PC game with a little protagonist, a water drop that wants to travel across the kitchen. Developed by Exkee using the Trinigy's Vision Engine (acquired by Havok in 2011). Published by Nobilis.

name: I Fetch Rocks
summary: Asteroid Hauler simulator designed from the ground up for Room Scale Virtual Reality. Completely customize, maintain and repair the controls and systems of your ship using 100s of interconnecting components that fully simulate power and data distribution.

name: If you touch me, I will marry you.
summary: “If you touch me, I will marry you.” is an escape room tag game where you can move your character to avoid obstacles and enjoy mini games.

name: If You Win...You Lose !
summary: A quite difficult and quite original platform adventure game, die and retry.
